CHAT.comment: ENTERGY LOUISIANA, INC., Petitioner v. LOUISIANA PUBLIC SERVICE COMMISSION, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID W. CARPENTER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF AUSTIN C. [*16] SCHLICK ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MICHAEL R. FONTHAM ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID W. CARPENTER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:56 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
